summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 43rd Avenue Northeast, from the northerly margin of 42nd Avenue Northeast to East 33rd Avenue Northeast; 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 33rd Street to 47th Avenue Northeast; 47th Avenue Northeast, from 45th Avenue Northeast to East 35th Street; East 31st Street, from 45th Avenue Northeast to 47th Avenue Northeast; East 33rd Street, from the northwesterly end thereof to 47th Avenue Northeast; the alley in block 17, Laurelhurst; from East 33rd Street to 43rd Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6513, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
